label: 鹿野
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: Kano was in great distress of her husband's death and went to Eisai for counsel.  Kano had been given a large manor.  At Eisai's urging, Kano donated funds to construct the paoda at Kenninji (pp. 15-16). [梶原景時、栄西、建仁寺]
